summary: The Protect Equality And Civics Education Act of 2025 (PEACE Act of 2025) aims to prohibit the use of certain federal funds for American History and Civics Education programs that promote or compel "divisive concepts." These concepts are defined in the bill and include race stereotyping, race scapegoating, and the promotion of ideas related to racial superiority and guilt. The bill seeks to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to enforce this prohibition.
